original_title: 幼い頃から成長を見守ってきた美少女を中年オヤジがネットリ犯す数日間の記録。 小花のん
overview: I quit my job and took care of my mother who suffered from dementia, but she also passed away six months ago. Before I knew it, I was at an age where it would be difficult to find a new job or get married. With my little savings running out, I decided to end my life. Because I made a will, it was time to carry it out... at that time. Hana-chan next door, who used to come often to play, suddenly came to visit.
title: A middle-aged man’s netting a beautiful girl he has watched grow up – Non Kohana
